title: Dell security advisory (AV25-791)
description: Between November 24 and 30, 2025, Dell published security advisories to address vulnerabilities in the following products:
products: Dell APEX Cloud Platform for Microsoft Azure  versions prior to 01.05.02.00
Dell CloudBoost Virtual Appliance  versions prior to 19.13.0.2
Dell PowerEdge T40  versions prior to 1.22.0
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
